description: This file defines a Python dataclass 'Together' that extends 'OpenAILike' for interacting with the Together API. It includes attributes for model identification, provider info, API key retrieval from environment variables, and base URL configuration.

classes.name: Together
classes.description: A class for interacting with Together API, extending OpenAILike with specific attributes for model ID, name, provider, API key, and base URL.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Default constructor initializing attributes with default values and environment variable for API key.
